meanings.definition: To suggest or endorse something as being good or suitable.
meanings.sent1: I am recommending this book to my friend because I think she will enjoy it.
meanings.sent2: She is recommending a new restaurant for us to try this weekend.
meanings.sent3: The cat is recommending the best spot in the house to take a nap.
meanings.sent4: The wise old owl is recommending patience as the key to solving problems.
meanings.sent5: The teacher is recommending extra practice to improve our math skills.

meanings.definition: To present someone or something as worthy of approval or acceptance.
meanings.sent1: He is recommending his colleague for a promotion based on her hard work.
meanings.sent2: The doctor is recommending this treatment for the patient's condition.
meanings.sent3: The dog is recommending his favorite toy as the best plaything.
meanings.sent4: The sunflower is recommending itself as the tallest flower in the garden.
meanings.sent5: The chef is recommending the special dish on the menu for tonight.
